thread.title: How do the Cleveland Indians define success? (video)
thread.title_full: How do the Cleveland Indians define success? (video) | cleveland.com

author: Chris Fedor, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: How do the Cleveland Indians define success? (video)
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- The Indians have wrapped up another season, finishing with a record above .500 for the third straight year.
Following the year, the team made front office moves, shifting Chris Antonetti to president and promoting Mike Chernoff to general manager.
We asked our Indians beat reporter, Paul Hoynes, whether the Indians view this past season as a success and how the front office changes will affect the off-season plan.
You can watch Sports Insider live every Thursday at noon at cleveland.com/sports .
